data.name: Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches: Kiss Me, Okay?
data.short_description: Ito Miyabi, who loves supernatural phenomena, appears just as Yamada, Urara, and Miyamura restart Supernatural Studies Club activities. Miyabi shows off her supernatural paraphernalia so proudly that Yamada and the others can't tell her the truth: that they only want to use the clubroom to kiss.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
